revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Glittering Cave |image = [[File:Glittering Cave.png|150px]] |caption = A map of Glittering Cave. |tokens = 505,000 |location = West of Route 9 }} '''Glittering Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 7,037,500 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop || rowspan=2|[[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || rowspan=2|[[File:Machop.png|40px]]Machop, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]]Zubat |- | [[File:Cubone.png|40px]] Cubone |- | [[File:Rhyhorn.png|40px]] Rhyhorn || rowspan=3|[[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || rowspan=3|[[File:Gulpin.png|40px]]Gulpin, [[File:Electrike.png|40px]]Electrike |- | [[File:Lunatone.png|40px]] Lunatone |- | [[File:Solrock.png|40px]] Solrock |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Mawile.png|40px]] Mawile || <center>61,285,398 ||rowspan=2|[[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_Duo.png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt Duo || [[File:Scraggy.png|40px]] Scraggy || <center> 33,084,827 |- | [[File:Kangaskhan.png|40px]] Kangaskhan || <center>63,749,659 || [[File:Croagunk.png|40px]] Croagunk || <center> 31,937,395 |}
